experiences.title: Software Developer & Teaching Assistant
experiences.at: Haute école du paysage, d'ingénierie et d'architecture de Genève
experiences.description: Responsible for developing and optimizing machine learning algorithms. Designing user interfaces to ease program configuration. Writing scientific papers. Assisting and mentoring students in their course work and projects.

experiences.title: Webmaster & IT Assistant
experiences.description: Intern webmaster for the website www.amivie.ch, contact manager and trainer for the colaborators regarding various tools (kanban, Infomaniak interfaces among others).

experiences.title: UI Developer
experiences.description: Project assignment supervised by ESIG school. Developed a graphical interface to ease the configuration of medical devices used for data collection.

formations.title: Bachelor of Science HES-SO in Informatics and Communication Systems
formations.at: Haute école du paysage, d'ingénierie et d'architecture de Genève
formations.description: A 3-year program with a specialization in Software Development. Learned to design, develop, and deploy software solutions using programming languages and frameworks. The curriculum includes software architecture, cross-platform development (web, mobile, desktop), concurrent computing among others.

formations.title: Advanced Diploma in Business IT (ES)
formations.description: A 2-year program focused on foundational training in programming, database management, and networking. Prepares students for roles such as developer, database administrator, business analyst, system administrator, and other specialties within business-oriented IT.

projects.title: Run Billy, Run !!!
projects.description: A 2D video game created as a final diploma project at ESIG. It draws strong inspiration from a mustached plumber whose name shall remain undisclosed.

projects.title: Simple galaxy sim
projects.description: A simulation of the physical behavior of celestial entities orbiting around another entity that is much more massive than them.

projects.title: Electric field sim
projects.description: A simulation the interaction between positively and negatively charged particles.

projects.title: MNIST based OCR
projects.description: A webapp displaying a canvas where you can write a digit by hand and ask to the app what's its guess on it.

projects.title: Bachelor thesis
projects.description: Exploring AI to assist visually impaired individuals by detecting objects in real time and describing them through synthetic voice. Several have been tested to achieve accurate detection and distance estimation, enhancing safety and independence.
